summary:
Are you a conjurer or mage? Or just a player who wants more help? Then this is for you! It\'s Draugr named Drugor
and it will help you to kill enemies!
descriptionHtml:
Hope you like this and remember to Endorse and give some feedback, if you want you could give me suggestions what to do BUT dont suggest to improve my Honeyside Improvement or Faem Hall player home because CK crash when I try to load those ;(

============================================================================================
Installation

 [list]
******************
 [*]NMM
******************
 [*]Click Downlad with NMM and then install it.


*****************
 [*]Regular
*****************
 [*]1. Download
 [*]2. Extract
 [*]3.Put the WrathOfAncestor.esp to /Skyrim/Data
 [*]4.Enjoy :) [/list]

Thanks to Cyther8897 for the name idea:D

And remember to watch my other mods too:D
author: Makezi
